title: The argument about sea turtles and plastic straws is so dumb ... - Reddit
body: Plastic straws .002%. Paper straws are terrible to use and there are new studies showing that they are actually harmful. Use a plastic straw that doesn't fucking crumble in 5 minutes. Silicone straws are fine, metal straws are fine. But if you are a crusader for paper straws I probably think you're an idiot and fall for corporate propaganda ...
